value.title: Open your Power BI Desktop model in Excel with just one click (two methods)
value.excerpt: It is now possible to download your Power BI desktop data into Excel with a simple click and I am going to show you two methods in this video. Enjoy! value.title: Power BI Tips & Tricks #07: Change multiple hardcoded path sources at once in Power BI

I am going to show you an easy way to solve this.  Here you can download the pbix file: http://trantor.synology.me:5000/fbsharing/nc9kfXTw

value.title: Scrape data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks

In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI. value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
value.excerpt: By default, column headings are only displayed in your reports if they contain data.
